com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.cameras

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.cameras.Camera
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrthographicCamera

    public abstract class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for cameras.
    Contains the view and projection matrices.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera()
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector3 getCenter()
      Returns the center vector (where the camera is looking at).
      Vector3 getEye()
      Returns the eye vector (camera position).
      float getFar()
      Returns the distance from the camera to the back of the viewing volume.
      float getNear()
      Returns the distance from the camera to the front of the viewing volume.
      Matrix4 getProjectionMatrix()
      Returns the projection matrix.
      Vector3 getUp()
      Returns the up vector (the up vector of the camera).
      Matrix4 getViewMatrix()
      Returns the view matrix.
      float getViewportHeight()
      Returns the height of the viewport in pixels.
      float getViewportWidth()
      Returns the width of the viewport in pixels.
      void setFar(float far)
      Sets the distance from the camera to the back of the viewing volume.
      void setNear(float near)
      Sets the distance from the camera to the front of the viewing volume.
      void setViewportDimensions(float viewportWidth, float viewportHeight)
      Sets the dimensions of the viewport.
      void setViewportHeight(float viewportHeight)
      Sets the height of the viewport.
      void setViewportWidth(float viewportWidth)
      Sets the width of the viewport.
      void translate(float x, float y, float z)
      Translates de eye vector.
      abstract void update()
      Updates the view and projection matrices with the current camera configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        public void translate(float x,
             float y,
             float z)
        Translates de eye vector.
        Changes will not be visible untill update() is called.
        Parameters:
        x - Value, in pixels, that will be added to the current X.
        y - Value, in pixels, that will be added to the current Y.
        z - Value, in pixels, that will be added to the current Z.
